snippet: Stanley Teitel, who has led Stuyvesant High School for 13 years, said he wanted “time to devote my energy to my family and personal endeavors.”
abstract: Stuyvesant High School principal Stanley Teitel announces his retirement amid a continued investigation into a cheating scandal that rocked New York City's flagship public school.
lead_paragraph: Stanley Teitel, who has led Stuyvesant High School for 13 years, said he wanted “time to devote my energy to my family and personal endeavors.”

headline.seo: Stuyvesant Principal Announces Retirement Amid Inquiry Into Cheating
headline.main: Amid Inquiry Into Cheating, Stuyvesant Principal Will Retire
headline.print_headline: Amid Inquiry Into Cheating, Stuyvesant Principal Will Retire
